    • Constructor Detail

      • Transaction

        public Transaction()
        Constructor. ID, time, value and size must be initialized with setters.

      • Transaction

        public Transaction(int id)
        Constructor for given ID. Time, value and size must be initialized with setters.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the transaction.

      • Transaction

        public Transaction(int ID,
                   long time,
                   float value,
                   float size)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        ID - The ID of the transaction.
        time - The time the transaction is created.
        value - The value of the transaction in local currency.
        size - The size of the transaction in bytes

      • Transaction

        public Transaction(int ID,
                   long time,
                   float value,
                   float size,
                   int nodeID)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        ID - The ID of the transaction.
        time - The time the transaction is created.
        value - The value of the transaction in local currency.
        size - The size of the transaction in bytes
        nodeID - The ID of the node where the transaction is supposed to show up. If undefined, please use constructor that omits this parameter.

        The id of the node where the transaction first arrives
        Returns:

        Gets the size of the transaction.
        Returns:
        The size of the transaction in bytes.

      • getType

        public Transaction.Type getType()
        Gets the transaction type. One of HONEST, MALICIOUS or FAKE.
        Returns:
        The transaction type. One of HONEST, MALICIOUS or FAKE.
